data.text: @petramiles74 @doubled25031977 Yes, it’s a great real life story that only should be in the hands of people like Scorsese to produce

@TheSopranosClub @doubled25031977 @petramiles74 Saw the @HBO film "Gotti" with the excellent actor @Armand_Assante in the lead (won an Emmy). Also, #AnthonyQuinn as "Neil" Dellacroce was top-notch. Very good mob film.
@doubled25031977 @petramiles74 But John was great in that OJ Simpson story. I agree the Gotti turn was poor but it was Travolta playing Gotti, worth watching just for that alone.
@TheSopranosClub @doubled25031977 Watching paint dry would have been better. A shame as it is a true story at least if i have problems sleeping i know what to put on

@doubled25031977 @petramiles74 Sadly I have to agree. I like Travolta’s spirit and effort. You can see he has put a lot into the role. But it just doesn’t work. Poorly put together in all areas. A real shame.
